benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/bundles/{bundleId}/tags - Add tags to bundle

covered: Valid Request coverage: TC01-TC07, plus TC20 (max payload) cover creation with valid payloads.
Empty Response handling: TC07 exercises empty array when there are no tags on the bundle.
Authorization coverage: TC16 covers missing/invalid authentication token.
Header validation: TC02 covers optional headers usage; TC13 covers missing required header.
Invalid payload coverage: TC10 (malformed JSON), TC11 (non-array body), TC12 (invalid UUIDs), TC15 (extra fields), TC18 (malicious payload).
BundleId validation: TC08 (invalid bundleId format) and TC09 (non-existent bundleId).
Large payloads coverage: TC20 (maximum payload) and TC21 (payload too large).
Backend failure handling: TC17 (503) and TC22 (504).
Performance coverage: TC24 (normal load) and TC25 (concurrent Load).
gaps: Rate limiting/throttling tests are not covered.
Caching behavior tests (ETag/Cache-Control) are not covered.
Role-based authorization edge cases beyond missing/invalid token (e.g., 403) are not explicitly tested.
Internal server error (500) scenarios are not explicitly tested (only 503/504).
Pagination is not applicable to POST; no pagination tests are needed for this endpoint.
recommendations: Add caching header validation (ETag/Cache-Control) on responses.
Include 403 Forbidden tests to cover insufficient-permission scenarios.
Add tests simulating 500 Internal Server Error (e.g., DB write failure).
If applicable, consider adding tests for any related GET/integration paths that exercise paging or caching in a broader suite.
